div.p: WE DO HAVE THE BETTER CLAIM.
IN OLD BRITAIN AT THE TIME.
Uhura: THIS IS A RED ALERT.
AND NOW, CAPTAIN, I WANT ALL
OF IT HERE ON THE STATION.
WE DO HAVE A LARGE NUMBER
WHAT ARE YOU TRYING TO DO,
IF I TAKE ONE OF THESE
AND SEE WHAT MAKES IT TICK?
WHAT CAN I DO FOR YOU?
GET OFF THAT MILK DIET, LAD?
AND IF I THINK THAT KIRK
THEY DO NOT TALK TOO MUCH.
TO A MAN WHO IS QUITE
HE IS ALSO A KLINGON SPY.
BUT HE IS AFTER MY GRAIN!
I DON'T CARE IF IT TAKES
I WANT THEM OFF THE SHIP.
ALL WE HAVE TO DO IS
A LOT OF THEM ARE DEAD.
HEY, YOU KNOW, I THINK I COULD
A THING LIKE THAT TO ME,
BONES, HOW DID YOU DO THAT?
